about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of BattleCards Saga, where strategic depth and a peaceful atmosphere converge in an engaging autobattle card game.

Drafting and Team Building

Craft your ultimate team by strategically selecting from over 700 uniquely illustrated cards. Combine different species to create powerful hybrids, each open new strategic possibilities.

Arena Combat

Challenge yourself in the arena where tactical decisions make the difference between victory and defeat. Each battle tests your ability to adapt and optimize your strategies, utilizing the fusion and the placement of your hybrid creatures.

Continuous Optimization

Refinement is key in BattleCards Saga. Return to battles to tweak your approach, experiment with different combinations, and discover the most effective ways to dominate the competition.


Collection and Fusion

Every card fusion not only empowers your team but also adds a beautifully illustration to your collection. Aim to discover and own every creature.

Detailed Statistics

Engage deeply with the game's elements through extensive statistics on each card. Mastery of these stats is crucial for formulating strategies that can lead to consistent wins in the arena.

A Mystical, Zen-like Universe

Set in a mystical and calming universe, the game offers a relaxing yet challenging environment. This backdrop enhances the strategic gameplay, making it a perfect escape for those who enjoy complexity in a serene setting.

Developed as a first project by a solo developer, this game is a testament to dedication and passion to create. Embracing every challenge as a learning opportunity, the developer has committed to optimizing and enhancing the player experience, making BattleCards Saga not just a game, but a truly beautiful evolving experience to discover.

name: BattleCards Saga

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10, 11, or 12 compatible GPU with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Steam connection required to launch the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 590 with 6 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Steam connection required to launch the game

short_description: Dive into BattleCards Saga : the card-fusing autobattler ! With over 800 unique animal cards, create the strongest team, discover all the combinations, and dominate the arena. Strategize and complete your collection.
